main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Salt Lake City, Utah on July 8, 1959, involving a round, bright light observed for 3-5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a half-moon shape, measured three times the size of a full moon at arm's length, It was noted that 20% of the object displayed a mass of flickering lights similar to airline windows, The object performed two medium rate turns and moved four times faster than jets in the area, The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear and sharp, The observer was identified as a radio repairman, who confirmed the object was not birds or natural phenomena.
sighted object: one round, bright light in the sky
witness description: a radio repairman from Salt Lake City, Utah
